Text:
36,42GB !!!  for a FREEWARE Firmware-Update ??!!??
Do you a little bit stupid bumbum?
One must be very stupid to download this torrent.

the file size on macupdate.com is indicated: 186MB.
This user wants to share his full HD?

Anonymous?? what's your real name or piratebay name?

nobody2007, 
this torrent contains saparate folders and files. So, as long as it is not ISO image or WinRAR archive, you can simply higlight the files (folders) you want. You can do this before you start downloading, or later in Files list. Also you may have to turn off the feature that allocates space. If the file you highlighted is very small you probably had to download 1-8 Mb of meta data
